content.summary: Working with Infosys Ltd as a DevOps Engineer in Canada, having experience in various Industry domains including financial, retail, telecommunication, insurance & banking sectors. Strong work ethics and ability to stay organized within fast-paced organizations.

experience.title: DevOps Engineer
roles_and_responsibilities: Implementing BDP (Big Data Platform) Continuous Integration and Continuous Delivery with GitLab & Infrastructure creation using Terraform & CFT.
Involved in Pipeline automation, EMR Cluster creation, client communication, debugging issues.

experience.title: DevOps Architect
roles_and_responsibilities: Working on implementing Continuous Integration and Continuous Delivery with Azure DevOps & migration using EY Fabric and Ansible Tower.
Involved in Pipeline automation, client communication, requirement analysis, debugging, and documentation.

experience.title: DevOps Consultant
roles_and_responsibilities: Implementing Continuous Integration and Continuous Delivery with various DevOps tools stack like GitLab, Helm, AWS & Azure Cloud.

experience.title: Senior Associate Consultant
roles_and_responsibilities: Handling DevOps tools stack like GitHub, Cloud bees Jenkins, Nexus, G3 (SABB tool) and Ansible Tower for Configuration Management.

experience.title: DevOps Consultant
roles_and_responsibilities: Designing on-Demand Insurance Application and Implemented DevOps methodology using AWS cloud services like Lambda, SNS, SQS and ECS fargate container instances.

experience.title: DevOps Engineer
roles_and_responsibilities: Worked as DevOps Engineer to Create and Develop Azure DevOps Pipeline for Different Environments and Provide knowledge and Training on Kubernetes to Our Team member and colleague

experience.title: Senior Software Engineer
roles_and_responsibilities: Worked on Cloud Based Location Analytics Solution project, contributed with Deployment and Automation role.

skills: Security Automation Tools: SonarQube, Veracode, Snyk, Fortify, Git Guardian
Infra. as a Code, IaC: CFT, ARM template & Terraform
Continuous Integration Tools: Azure DevOps, GitLab, Jenkins AWS CodePipeline
Continuous Deployment Tools: Ansible & Ansible Tower
Cloud Services: Amazon Web Services (AWS), AZURE Cloud
Databases: MySQL, NoSQL, Azure Cosmos DB, MongoDB
Project Management Tools: JIRA, MS Project, Confluence
API & Monitoring Tools: Postman, Prometheus, Grafana, ELK

candidate_attributes_inferred.academic_performance: Graduated with a BE in Computer Science & Engineering from The National Institute of Engineering, Mysore, India
candidate_attributes_inferred.initiative_and_self_learning: Self-learning AI/ML for DevOps, a journey from manual processes with infrequent deployments and slow innovation cycles to rapid iteration cycles with CI/CD, automated alarming for monitoring production.
candidate_attributes_inferred.teamwork_or_leadership_traits: Managed & Leading DevOps teams across several clients
candidate_attributes_inferred.communication_clarity: Involved in client communication, requirement analysis, debugging, code review and documentation.
candidate_attributes_inferred.standout_traits: Strong work ethics, ability to stay organized within fast-paced organizations.
